# currentItem

**Instance Property**

The item for which the player is currently controlling playback.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var currentItem: AVPlayerItem? { get }
```

## Managing the player item

- **replaceCurrentItem(with:)**: Replaces the current item with a new item.

items.description: Replaces the current item with a new item.
items.name: replaceCurrentItem(with:)
